unnormalised: Fyi mhunn sangta, Industrial Disputes Act, 1947 hachea pormannem, khas korun Section 2(ra) antargot, ek 'strike' mhunnje vhodd promannant sanglam. Tuka khobor asa kai ki kaslich suchna nastana nirantar ghair hazri mhunnlear ek 'go-slow' tactic mhunn vollkhunk zata, ani tem potr'yak Sec 22 ullonghon korunk xokta? Tech bhaxen, karkunank minimum wages act 1948 vixim tanche hakk vollkhun gheunk zai; contractacher aslelearui, tankam kami-kami mhunnlear ₹10000 dor mhoineaak mellpak zai. Vistrut kaideachea updesakhatir Adv. Sharma-kakodde poramorsh gheiat.
normalised: Tumchea mahitiekhatir, Industrial Disputes Act, eka hozar nooshe chellis ani sat, khas korun Section don (r a) khal, 'hartal' mhonnje kitlem-i vhodd mhonn dakhovn dilem asa. Tumkam khobor asli ki bhendak sandhen vell zayta mhonn sanginashtana lagatar hazir ravonastana aslear ten 'go-slow' mhonn vagoitat, zacho Section twenty two ullanghon korunk xakta? Toxench, karkunank tankam mellpak zai te paisse eka hozar nooshe chellis ani aath khal tankanchi zannvai asunk zai; contractacher astana-i, tankam kamit-kamit rupea dha hozar dor mhoineak mellpak zai. Advocate Sharma-kodden vistrut kanoonachi salah gheiat.
text: Fyi mhunn sangta, Industrial Disputes Act, 1947 hachea pormannem, khas korun Section 2(ra) antargot, ek 'strike' mhunnje vhodd promannant sanglam. Tuka khobor asa kai ki kaslich suchna nastana nirantar ghair hazri mhunnlear ek 'go-slow' tactic mhunn vollkhunk zata, ani tem potr'yak Sec 22 ullonghon korunk xokta? Tech bhaxen, karkunank minimum wages act 1948 vixim tanche hakk vollkhun gheunk zai; contractacher aslelearui, tankam kami-kami mhunnlear ₹10000 dor mhoineaak mellpak zai. Vistrut kaideachea updesakhatir Adv. Sharma-kakodde poramorsh gheiat.
